title: UI Screen Collection & Analysis Tool
meta_description: Analyze and generate UI designs for games with our AI-powered tool. Filter by style, type, theme, and function.
hero_title: Transform Game UI Design with AI Analysis
hero_subtitle: Analyze UI screens, extract components, generate JSON configurations, and import directly into your game engine.
features_title: Powerful Features for Game UI Development
features_subtitle: Save hundreds of development hours with our specialized UI analysis tools
feature_1_desc: Upload any game UI screenshot and get detailed component breakdown, style analysis, and layout information.
feature_2_desc: Convert analyzed screens into structured JSON that can be imported directly into Cocos Creator 3.8 and other game engines.
feature_3_desc: Browse and filter over 10,000 UI screens by style, type, theme, function, platform, layout, and release year.
feature_4_desc: Analyze screens from images, videos, URLs, Figma designs, and HTML interfaces with equal precision.
feature_5_desc: Built-in plugins for Cocos Creator 3.8 and other engines to import UI configurations directly into your projects.
feature_6_desc: Get suggestions for UI improvements based on genre best practices and player preferences.
feature_ai_desc: Our tool automatically analyzes game UI images generated by Midjourney, Ideogram, or ImageFX, extracts components, and generates ready-to-use configurations.
playground_title: Experience the Power of UI Analysis
playground_subtitle: Try our core features directly in your browser
upload_instruction: Drag & drop a UI image or click to browse
premium_note: Full export functionality available in premium plans
showcase_subtitle: Browse our library of analyzed AI-generated game UIs and see how they transform into usable game interfaces
workflow_subtitle: From concept to implementation in minutes, not days
step_1_desc: Use Midjourney/Ideogram/ImageFX to generate a UI design, or upload an existing design image
step_2_desc: Our AI automatically analyzes the image, identifies all UI components, and extracts them
step_3_desc: Get structured JSON configuration with all extracted components ready for game engine implementation
step_4_desc: Import directly to Cocos Creator 3.8 with our plugin - no manual assembly required
comparison_subtitle: See why developers choose UIScreenAI over other solutions
pain_points_subtitle: We've identified and addressed the biggest pain points in game UI implementation
pain_1_problem: Problem: Manually recreating UI designs in game engines is tedious and can take days or weeks.
pain_1_solution: Our Solution: Automatic analysis and JSON generation reduces implementation time by up to 94%, turning days of work into minutes.
pain_2_problem: Problem: Final game UI often doesn't match the original design due to manual implementation errors.
pain_2_solution: Our Solution: Pixel-perfect analysis ensures the final implementation matches the design exactly as intended.
pain_3_problem: Problem: Identifying UI components and their properties from flat designs is challenging.
pain_3_solution: Our Solution: AI-powered component recognition instantly identifies buttons, panels, text fields, and other UI elements with high accuracy.
pain_4_problem: Problem: Translating designs to different game engine formats requires specialized knowledge.
pain_4_solution: Our Solution: Built-in plugins for popular engines like Cocos Creator 3.8 allow one-click imports with proper formatting and structure.
pain_5_problem: Problem: Finding appropriate UI references for specific game types or functions is difficult.
pain_5_solution: Our Solution: Our categorized library of over 10,000 game UI screens provides instant inspiration and reference for any project.
pain_6_problem: Problem: Adapting UI from one platform to another requires significant rework.
pain_6_solution: Our Solution: Automatic detection of platform-specific patterns and intelligent suggestions for cross-platform adaptations.
pain_ai_1_problem: Problem: Tools like Midjourney, Ideogram, and ImageFX generate complete UI images that still require manual slicing and reassembly in game engines.
pain_ai_1_solution: Our Solution: Our tool automatically analyzes AI-generated images, extracts components, and creates ready-to-use assets and configurations.
pain_ai_2_problem: Problem: ChatGPT and similar tools can generate HTML prototypes, but sprites need to be manually created, styles are inconsistent, and they can't be directly used in Unity or Cocos Creator.
pain_ai_2_solution: Our Solution: Our Cocos Creator plugin enables direct import of analyzed UI with all components, maintaining consistent style without manual assembly.
testimonials_subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied developers who have streamlined their UI workflow
testimonial_1: UIScreenAI saved our team weeks of work. We imported our UI designs directly into Cocos Creator and had working menus in hours instead of days. The JSON generation is flawless.
testimonial_2: As a solo developer, UI implementation was always my bottleneck. With UIScreenAI, I can focus on gameplay and let the tool handle all the UI heavy lifting. It's been a game-changer for my workflow.
testimonial_3: The component recognition is incredibly accurate. It identified all UI elements from our Figma designs and generated perfect JSON that we could import directly. No more manual recreation!
pricing_subtitle: Flexible options for every team size and project
free_description: Try the basic features and see how it works
pro_description: Perfect for indie developers and small teams
enterprise_description: For professional studios and large teams
enterprise_feature_4: Priority access to new UI libraries
final_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Game UI Workflow?
final_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of game developers who have accelerated their UI development process
no_credit_card: No credit card required. Start with our free plan today.
